channel.title: Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-95 North Approaching US-Canada Border
item.description: US-95 north approaching US-Canada Border. For Reentry Information Requests turn left to access US Customs. Continue straight ahead for Canada Customs.

item.title: US-95 North - Approaching US-Canada International Border
item.description: US-95 north approaching US-Canada International Border in Boundary County.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 151
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 151 - Threemile Canyon

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 302A
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 302A - Rose Quarter/Broadway - Weidler St.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 62
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 62 - West Hood River/Westcliff Drive.

item.title: US-12 West - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-12 west at Lolo Pass. Entering Pacific Time Zone.

item.title: US-95 at Boundary St. - Continue Ahead For Canada
item.description: US-95 approaching international boundary in Eastport. Stay on US-95 for Canada.

item.title: US-95 - U.S. Border Station, Eastport, Idaho
item.description: US-95 north at the US Border Station - Eastport, Idaho.

item.title: US-95 Leaving US Customs
item.description: US-95 shield at exit of US Customs at Port of Eastport. Turn right for US-95 and to leave US Customs facility.

item.title: US-95 North - US Border Station Parking
item.description: US-95 north at US Border Station Visitor Parking, at the US-Canada boundary in Eastport.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching US-Canada Border
item.description: US-95 north approaching US-Canada Border. For Reentry Information Requests turn left to access US Customs. Continue straight ahead for Canada Customs.

item.title: US-95 North - Approaching US-Canada Boundary
item.description: US-95 north approaching US-Canada International Border in Boundary County.

item.title: US-95 North At ID-1
item.description: US-95 north at ID-1. Continue north on US-95 for the Canadian Border, Port of Eastport/Port of Kingsgate crossing. Use ID-1 north for the Canadian Border, Port of Porthill/Port of Rykerts.

item.title: US-95 North - Idaho Ports Of Entry Hours
item.description: Customs hours approaching on US-95 north approaching ID-1 junction. Porthill Port of Entry (via ID-1) open from 7 AM - 11 PM. Eastport Port of Entry (via US-95) open 24 hours.

item.title: US-2 West At US-95
item.description: US-2 west at US-95. Turn right for US-95 north to Canada. Turn left for US-95 South/US-2 West to Sandpoint and Bonners Ferry.

item.title: US-2 West Approaching US-95
item.description: US-2 west approaching US-95 in Boundary County.

item.title: US-95 North at ID-5 East
item.description: US-95 north at ID-5 east to St. Maries. Continue north on US-95 for Coeur d’Alene and Spokane (Washington).

item.title: US-95 North approaching ID-60
item.description: US-95 north at ID-60 west to Tekoa (Washington). Continue north on US-95 for Plummer and Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: US-95 North at ID-60
item.description: US-95 north at ID-60 in Benewah County.

item.title: US-95 North - Benewah County and Coeur d'Alene Indian Res.
item.description: US-95 north - Entering Benewah County and Coeur d’Alene Indian Reservation.

item.title: US-95 North/ID-6 At ID-6 East
item.description: US-95 North/ID-6 East at ID-6 junction. Turn right for ID-6 east to Potlatch; merge left for US-95 north to Plummer and Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: US-95 North/ID-6 Approaching ID-6 East
item.description: US-95 North/ID-6 at ID-6 east junction near Potlatch.

item.title: US-95 North at ID-6 West
item.description: US-95 north at ID-6 west to Colfax (Washington). Continue north on US-95/ID-6 East to Potlatch and Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching ID-6 West
item.description: US-95 north approaching ID-6 west in Latah County.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching ID-66
item.description: US-95 north approaching ID-66 in Latah County.

item.title: US-95 North at US-195 To Spokane
item.description: US-95 north at US-195 north to Spokane.

item.title: US-95 North at US-195 North
item.description: US-95 north at US-195 north to Pullman (WA) and Spokane (WA).

item.title: US-95 North/US-12 at US-12 West
item.description: US-95 North/US-12 West at US-95/US-12 split. Use right lane for US-95 north to Moscow and Coeur d’Alene. Use left lanes for US-12 west to Lewiston and Walla Walla (Washington).

item.title: US-95 North at US-12
item.description: US-95 north at US-12. Merge right for US-12 east to Orofino and Missoula (Montana). Continue straight ahead for US-95 North/US-12 West to Lewiston and Moscow. US-12 joins US-95 north to Lewiston.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching US-12
item.description: US-95 north approaching US-12, on the Clearwater River bridge in Nez Perce County.

item.title: US-95 North at Bus. US-95 - Craigmont North Entrance
item.description: US-95 north at Bus. US-95 to Craigmont. Continue north on US-95 for Lewiston and Moscow.

item.title: US-95 North at ID-13
item.description: US-95 north at ID-13 east to Kooskia. Continue north on US-95 for Craigmont and Lewiston.

item.title: OR-6 East at OR-8
item.description: OR-6 east at OR-8 east to Forest Grove.
